name: VenueScanner
description: VenueScanner makes finding and booking the perfect space quick, simple and affordable. Whether you're looking for a venue for that critical meeting, wild party or somewhere to jam with your band, we'll help you find the right option, at the best price. Check out venuescanner.com

team.name: Rebecca Kelly
team.bioHtml:
Co-Founder & Director - www.VenueScanner.com
Head of Digital Growth - Majestic Group: Majestic, Naked Wines & Lay Wheeler.

team.title: Chief Product Officer / Chief Operating Officer
team.name: Benjy Meyer
team.bioHtml: Corporate Intrapreneur turned Startup Entrepreneur -  Founder / Director at VenueScanner

team.title: Head of Data & Performance Marketing
team.name: Kurt Rimbach
team.bioHtml: A web analytics and data specialist with six years experience working for early stage startups and FTSE100 clients to democratise data and generate new insights

jobs.title: Content Marketing Intern
jobs.description:
This is an opportunity to be part of an exciting stage of growth from VenueScanner where we are ramping up activity and launching several new products and business features all of which needs serious marketing and creative attention! This is a chance to see how a real start-up operates and be a core part of its growth into a market leading product. You will have great independence and responsibility, love a challenge, be a ‘doer’ and be naturally energetic and passionate. You won’t be afraid to get stuck in and involved in project work which may take you outside of your comfort zone but a real opportunity to constantly learn.

>Help execute the digital marketing strategy 
>Build and manage social media presence on Facebook, Instagram & Twitter. Start building content around premium venues,  venue finding & events organising. 
>Test social mechanics which drive the greatest ‘shareability’ of content so we can reach the widest audience most cost effectively
>Email Marketing to target both hosts and organisers to build into our CRM, automate the email triggers with database.
>Copy & creative for marketing campaigns including Google, Facebook, Partnerships etc
>Create interesting, fun industry relevant content e.g. Top 10’s, How To’s, Video Interviews whatever you fancy!
>Help manage and promote the newly launched Executive Club - bringing a premium concierge service to our corporate members
>Be a brand ambassador! Get venues in your area involved, tell your friends etc!
jobs.descriptionHtml:
This is an opportunity to be part of an exciting stage of growth from VenueScanner where we are ramping up activity and launching several new products and business features all of which needs serious marketing and creative attention! This is a chance to see how a real start-up operates and be a core part of its growth into a market leading product. You will have great independence and responsibility, love a challenge, be a ‘doer’ and be naturally energetic and passionate. You won’t be afraid to get stuck in and involved in project work which may take you outside of your comfort zone but a real opportunity to constantly learn.

Help execute the digital marketing strategy
Build and manage social media presence on Facebook, Instagram & Twitter. Start building content around premium venues, venue finding & events organising.
Test social mechanics which drive the greatest ‘shareability’ of content so we can reach the widest audience most cost effectively
Email Marketing to target both hosts and organisers to build into our CRM, automate the email triggers with database.
Copy & creative for marketing campaigns including Google, Facebook, Partnerships etc
Create interesting, fun industry relevant content e.g. Top 10’s, How To’s, Video Interviews whatever you fancy!
Help manage and promote the newly launched Executive Club - bringing a premium concierge service to our corporate members
Be a brand ambassador! Get venues in your area involved, tell your friends etc!
